amendment.description: To establish a spending-neutral reserve fund relating to protecting vulnerable families from job killing regulations.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 506 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 506 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Sullivan. (consideration: CR S1977-1978; text: CR S1977-1978) To establish a spending-neutral reserve fund relating to protecting vulnerable families from job killing regulations.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 506 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Sullivan.
